mapper.insert: insert into product (product_name, product_rank, product_qty, origin, manufacture_date, weight, size, product_reg_date, kind, product_image, detail_image, view_count, price, sold_qty, starred ) values( #{product_name}, #{product_rank}, #{product_qty}, #{origin}, #{manufacture_date}, #{weight}, #{size}, #{product_reg_date}, #{kind}, #{product_image_name}, #{detail_image_name}, #{view_count}, #{price}, #{sold_qty}, #{starred})
mapper.select:
SELECT product_code, product_name, product_qty, origin, manufacture_date, weight, size, detail_image, view_count, product_reg_date, kind, product_image, price FROM product WHERE
product_name LIKE #{product_name} ${selected} ${orderby}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name=#{product_name}, product_qty=#{product_qty}, origin=#{origin}, manufacture_date=#{manufacture_date}, weight=#{weight}, size=#{size}, detail_image=#{detail_image_name}, view_count=#{view_count}, product_reg_date=now(), kind=#{kind}, product_image=#{product_image_name} WHERE product_code=#{product_code}
mapper.select:
SELECT cust_id, name, tel, email, address, cust_rank, reg_date
FROM customer WHERE name like #{name} AND ${notThis} ${orderby2};

SELECT inquire.inquire_code, inquire.cust_id, inquire.product_code, inquire.inquire_date, inquire.inquire_content, product.product_name
FROM inquire
INNER JOIN product on inquire.product_code = product.product_code
WHERE inquire.answer_content is null AND ${Not} ORDER BY inquire.inquire_date desc
mapper.update: update inquire set answer_content=#{answer} where inquire_code=#{inquire_code}
